parameter.name: fileLimit
parameter.description: Maximum limitation of files that can be retrieve. Default is 10,000 (max is 25,000).

parameter.name: hash
parameter.description: Each call to /metadata on a folder will return a hash field, generated by hashing all of the metadata contained in that response.

parameter.name: list
parameter.description: The strings true and false are valid values.

parameter.name: includeDeleted
parameter.description: Only applicable when list is set.

parameter.name: rev
parameter.description: If you include a particular revision number, then only the metadata for that revision will be returned.

parameter.name: locale
parameter.description: The metadata returned will have its size field translated based on the given locale.

parameter.name: includeMediaInfo
parameter.description: If true will return media info
